details.label: MISSION DETAILS
details.computedValue:
{{(() => { const tableData = Table1.processedTableData || []; return tableData.length > 0 ? tableData.map((currentRow, currentIndex) => ( 
  currentRow.details.drone_id ? 
  `DRONE_ID : ${currentRow.details.drone_id},
PAYLOAD : ${currentRow.details.payload}, 
OPERATION_AREA : ${currentRow.details.operation_area}` 
  : currentRow.details.relay_id ? 
  `RELAY_ID : ${currentRow.details.relay_id},
CHANNEL : ${currentRow.details.channel}, 
ENCRYPTION_PROTOCOL : ${currentRow.details.encryption_protocol}` 
  : `DATABASE_NAME : ${currentRow.details.database_name},
SYNC_FREQUENCY : ${currentRow.details.sync_frequency},
TRANSMISSION_CHANNEL : ${currentRow.details.transmission_channel}`
)) :  
  currentRow.details.drone_id ? 
  `DRONE_ID : ${currentRow.details.drone_id},
PAYLOAD : ${currentRow.details.payload}, 
OPERATION_AREA : ${currentRow.details.operation_area}` 
  : currentRow.details.relay_id ? 
  `RELAY_ID : ${currentRow.details.relay_id},
CHANNEL : ${currentRow.details.channel}, 
ENCRYPTION_PROTOCOL : ${currentRow.details.encryption_protocol}` 
  : `DATABASE_NAME : ${currentRow.details.database_name},
SYNC_FREQUENCY : ${currentRow.details.sync_frequency},
TRANSMISSION_CHANNEL : ${currentRow.details.transmission_channel}`
 })()}}
